name: Gremlin
body:
# What is Gremlin?

Gremlin is a _free_ media import framework for iOS, used by popular products such as Celeste, 
iFile, Safari Download Manager and YourTube.

### Developers

If you are developing a free and open source application, you can use Gremlin to perform media 
import, all you need to do is link against **Gremlin.framework** and call:

```objective-c
[Gremlin importFileAtPath:path_to_file]
```

Alternatively, you may use any one of the import APIs defined in `Gremlin/Gremlin.h`. More
details on this feature will be made available soon.

### Plugins

Gremlin is entirely plugin-based! What this means is that if you can build an importer plugin
for any type of file targeting any destination of your choice. Gremlin comes pre-packaged with
a document import plugin that allows you to import files to generic apps that declare file type
support using QuickLook/LaunchServices. 

If you require more fine-grained control, or your
particular target does not support LaunchServices, you can build an import plugin for this
purpose. Once installed your plugin will become automatically available to any application that
uses Gremlin!

### License terms

Gremlin is licensed under a modified GPLv3 license. In addition to the terms imposed by GPLv3, you may not distribute or use Gremlin whether directly or indirectly for the purposes of financial gain without explicit written consent of the author, Youssef Francis. It is important to note that this policy is
targeting only specific offenders, my intent is for Gremlin to be used by as many developers and users
as possible.

For questions regarding licensing, please email me at francis AT yfrancis DOT com.
